author: Frank Corrieri
subject: Kiwi
body:
Lupin fans:

If you're looking for Lupin movies or episodes, check out Kiwi's Independent 
Distribution Service (http://www.jps.net/kaskey/KIDS/).  They have a few 
Lupin movies and episodes, but it's the most I've been able to find 
anywhere, since a lot of hobby stores carry the same stock, like Castle 
Cagliostro and Aloha Lupin...etc.  Best of all, they're cheap.  I bought 5 
movies and 4 episodes for $36.  This may sound like an advertisement, but I 
don't work for them! I found them through hunting around and thought I would 
share them with Lupin fans everywhere.

> > Yes, Aramis (I think he's Arsene in Japanese version or Cliff in
> > English one) the wise Aramis Lupin, and Julian, I guess he is Zenigata 
>or
> > something like that... but the one i like the best is Vanessa (Fujiko) 
>*_*
>
>Hi, I'm Mariana from Argentina, and I wanted to know the time they show
>Lupin on Locomotion, (I think I'm getting it next month!!!!).
>My fav character is Jigen (Julian, the guy with the black hat and suit).
>Next Arsene Lupin (Aramis) and Goemon (Ramon) , 3rd Zenigata (the police
>inspector) and finally Fujiko. (Isn't she called Jessica in some episodes?)
>Also, the channel the Film Zone used to put on some specials, I haven't
>seen'em in a while, though.
>Well, that's it.
>
>Mari ^_^
>
